CustomField.description: Boolean determines which Email Template to send.
CustomField.formula: IF(Manufacturing_Process__c='Injection Molding: Injection Molding Tool: '||Manufacturing_Process__c='Injection Molding Tool: '||Manufacturing_Process__c='Extrusion: '||Manufacturing_Process__c='Injection Molding: '||Manufacturing_Process__c='Urethane Casting: ', false, true)
CustomField.label: InstantQuote?
